config.velocitydamage.velocityIncrement: "Increases" the necessary velocity to do an arbitrary damage by a factor of this.
config.velocitydamage.exponentiationCons: Changes the power of the damage calculation function.
config.velocitydamage.minDamagePercent: The minimum amount of damage, as a percentage of the original, that a debuffed attack may do.
config.velocitydamage.maxDamagePercent: The maximum bonus amount of damage, as a percentage of the original, that a buffed attack may do.
config.velocitydamage.velocityThreshold: The velocity over which entities slamming into walls will take damage. Set to 0 to disable this.
config.velocitydamage.projectileMultipli: Projectile speeds (IN CALCULATIONS) are subtracted by this percentage of the original value. Set to 0 to disable projectile velocity buffs.
config.velocitydamage.projectilesHaveMom: If true, projectiles have the velocity of the entity who fired it added.
config.velocitydamage.wildMode: Disables any nerfs and causes other assorted mayhem if enabled. (e.g. arrows retain the vanilla speed damage bonus)
